text: UPC Switzerland is a Swiss television provider. UPC Switzerland broadcast over language provider satellite for channels of French, German and Romansh. ==History== UPC Switzerland was founded in 1994, which beguns cable channel, IPTV and such as others On May, 23 2022, UPC Switzerland is begin closed and defunct. ==Stubs== Category:20th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:21st-century disestablishments in Switzerland Category:1994 establishments in Europe Category:2022 disestablishments in Europe Category:Technology companies of Switzerland
title: UPC Switzerland
